original_text: Chris Dixon认为：每条原始的Unix命令，都会变成一项互联网服务。Grep->Google, rsync->Dropbox, man->stack overflow, cron->ifttt...... 要创业的同学，选一条命令快上? [懒得理你]
text: Chris Dixon认为：每条原始的Unix命令，都会变成一项互联网服务。Grep->Google, rsync->Dropbox, man->stack overflow, cron->ifttt...... 要创业的同学，选一条命令快上? [懒得理你]

children.text: ln -> bit.ly, ls -> yahoo, passwd -> duo security, top -> stackdriver, python -> gae, vi -> evernote, mail -> gmail, ntpsweep -> ddos, bash -> botnet, write -> qq, nslookup -> 3721, rm -> 360 // @YJHHHHHHHH：mv->Tencent...

其实还有一个思路就是把日常用的东西智能化，再连上互联网。比如眼镜，手表，电视，温控器，汽车，you name it。。@keithcool: ln -> bit.ly, ls -> yahoo, passwd -> duo security, top -> stackdriver, python -> gae, vi -> evernote, mail -> gmail, ntpsweep -> ddos, bash -> botnet
